Transforming Data into Decisions

     

Custom solutions for Natural Language Processing and Machine Learning

Ticary provides consulting services in Natural Language Processing and Machine Learning. Ticary Solutions is your one stop shop for understanding your structured or unstructured data, and derive conclusions from it. Transform your data into insights and make strategic business decisions from it.

We are not your typical consulting firm. We promise and deliver excellence to each of our clients. We strongly stand by our guiding principles below, and deliver nothing short of excellence.

Creativity

Out of the box solutions for each client.

Giving Back

Free services for non-profits.

Honest recommendations.

Services

Here are a few example services that we can help deliver:

  • Identify underlying themes in your text data
  • Identifying sentiment from customer reviews
  • Discovering topics from textual data
  • Text Analytics of Electronic Medical Records
  • Text Classification
  • Sales and Marketing data analytics
  • Finding new trends and insights from data
  • Recommender Systems
  • Topic Modeling
  • Classification
  • Clustering
  • NLP Education and custom courses
  • NLP meetup group in Seattle
  • Health Informatics
  • Statistical Reasoning and Analysis
  • Data Mining and Data Analysis
  • Custom Search Solutions
  • Health Informatics
  • Automated Question Answering
